Uses of Class
org.kitteh.irc.client.library.ClientBuilder

  • Packages that use ClientBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.kitteh.irc.client.library
    Kitteh IRC Client Library!

    • Uses of ClientBuilder in org.kitteh.irc.client.library

      Methods in org.kitteh.irc.client.library that return ClientBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.auth(AuthType authType, String name, String pass)
      Sets values for authentication with services on the server.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.bind(int port)
      Binds the client to the specified port.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.bind(String host)
      Binds the client to a host or IP locally.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.clone()
      Clones this builder.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenException(Consumer<Exception> listener)
      Sets a listener for all thrown exceptions on this client.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenInput(Consumer<String> listener)
      Sets a listener for all incoming messages from the server.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.listenOutput(Consumer<String> listener)
      Sets a listener for all outgoing messages to the server.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.name(String name)
      Names the client, for internal labeling.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.nick(String nick)
      Sets the client's nick.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.realName(String name)
      Sets the realname the client uses.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.secure(boolean ssl)
      Sets whether the client connects via SSL.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.server(int port)
      Sets the server IP to which the client will connect.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.server(String host)
      Sets the server host to which the client will connect.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.serverPassword(String password)
      Sets the server password.
      ClientBuilder ClientBuilder.user(String user)
      Sets the user the client connects as.
